column1: Invitation to U.S. Citizens: the Embassy will hold a town hall event in Yangon on March 5 at 5 PM at the U.S. Embassy to discuss #COVID19 and answer your questions. RSVP to ACSRangoon@state.gov. Full message: https://mm.usembassy.gov/message-for-u-s-citizens-u-s-citizen-town-hall-in-yangon-march-5-2020/
